title: View/Edit Summoner Profile Bug
body: I can't open my profile in league, It's really buggy and won't even open. It says the servers couldn't connect or something I need help. (Yes I've restarted tons of time)

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  It sounds like your network may have had a hiccup and couldn't download assets.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune you up connection and get the most of your network!  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JdzE8P8z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-17T20:35:41.354+0000)
>
> Are you still having this issue?  It sounds like your network may have had a hiccup and couldn't download assets.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune you up connection and get the most of your network!  Let me know if you have any questions.

I still am, I don't know the exact message that pops up but it still will not let me.

I have the same problem sometime i can't open my summoner profile and i need restart the game.
I don't know what happend but i hope riot will fix it. (sorry for my english.)
